Web App Security Automation

Seamless integration of Qualys Web Application Scanning with Qualys Web Application Firewall brings uniquely scalable scanning, reduction of false-positives and one-click patching to web apps, including mobile apps and IoT services.

MORE
 

New SOCs Launched

Organizations can now more easily comply with global and regional regulations that impact where data resides via Qualys' three new Secure Operations Centers (SOCs) in the European Union, North America and India.

MORE
 

#1 in Vulnerability Assessment Market

Industry analyst firm IDC lists Qualys as the market-share leader in the Worldwide Vulnerability Assessment Market.

Partner News


TECHNOLOGY PARTNERS

App for IBM QRadar

A new Qualys App for IBM's QRadar Security Intelligence Platform allows joint customers to visualize their IT assets and vulnerabilities in real time, and helps teams produce continuous vulnerability and risk metrics from a data analytics perspective.

MORE
 

Bugcrowd

The new Qualys / Bugcrowd integration allows joint customers a unique ability to share vulnerability data across automated web application scanning and crowdsourced bug bounty programs, helping them increase breadth of security testing and reduce cost.

MORE
 

Infoblox

The new Qualys / Infoblox integration enables Infoblox customers to automatically trigger scanning when new devices join the network or when malicious events are detected, helping with asset management and remediation through near real-time visibility and automation.

MORE
 

IBM MSS & Deutsche Telekom

Two new partnerships with IBM Managed Security Services and Deutsche Telekom bring enhanced visibility of IT assets, vulnerabilities and threat data to their customers.

IBM MSS
DEUTSCHE TELEKOM
